description:
Jack is cute as shit. He's a young, lean blonde who smiles constantly.
You may notice that in this video Jack looks past the camera a lot. Well here's the deal... he brought his girlfriend (a hot little Asian number) with him to the shoot and she wanted to watch. So, she sat in a chair behind the camera and lights and watched her boyfriend pop a nut for the camera. You never hear her because she was very quiet and never uttered a word. But she really got into it and I think Jack really got off on having her there. I have to admit that I found it pretty hot too.
title: Jack
